description:
The Dagger CUE SDK contains everything you need to develop CI/CD pipelines using the CUE configuration language, and run them on any OCI-compatible container runtime.

Using the Dagger CUE SDK and execute on a Dagger Engine by using the dagger-cue CLI. You can connect to an existing Dagger Engine, or the dagger-cue CLI will provision one on-the-fly.
summary: Dagger CUE SDK contains everything you need to develop CI/CD pipelines using the CUE configuration language, and run them on any OCI-compatible container runtime.
author: Dagger,  Dagger  Committers
